segments.text: Good afternoon , madam . Is there anything I can do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I spent so much time sightseeing here . It is already so late now . I am afraid I can't catch the last bus back to downtown .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . I will try to get a taxi for you . You can take it to the bus station .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am very grateful to your help .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't mention it . It is my duty .
segments.speaker: S1
